description: Jane Doe is an accounting specialist at Sterling & Locke Financial Group who handles client W-2s, wages, and overall financial planning.
relationship: Mrs. Evelyn Carter is Jane’s mother and they chat regularly on Slack. Jane also works with several clients—such as Michael Brown, Alex Johnson, and Emily Stanton—and collaborates daily with her colleagues at Sterling & Locke. She occasionally talks with family members like her aunt about personal matters.
